revised_title: Exploring the Perception of Color-Blindness: A Study on One-Sided Color-Blindness
tldr: The author investigates the perception of color-blind individuals by examining two cases of one-sided color-blindness, where one eye is partially color-blind and the other has a nearly normal vision. The study aims to understand how color-blind individuals perceive colors and how their perception differs from that of normal-eyed individuals.
